alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 1:18AM CST until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River at Tombigbee River at Bigbee ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Tombigbee River near Amory Buttahatchie River near Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Tombigbee River at Bigbee, Tombigbee River near Amory, Tombigbee River Aberdeen L & D... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Buttahatchie River...including Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buttahatchie River near Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water is flowing over Air Base Road on the west bank of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this afternoon to 17.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall early Saturday afternoon. It will rise to 16.3 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 130 PM CST.
